Functions

Function(s) admin.delete_part_eventcontrolstatehistorydo.
To be used as Database Job. Remove old history entries of closed Events, except the last state (state=8000). The batchsize configuration corresponds to the maximum number of EventControlDO to consider; This is less than the number of entries which may be effectively deleted in EventControlStateHistoryDO. example: select admin.delete_part_eventcontrolstatehistorydo('{"days2keep": 60, "batchsize": 5000}')

FUNCTION admin.delete_part_eventcontrolstatehistorydo ( config json ) RETURNS integer LANGUAGE 'plpgsql' volatile;
